articles.description: "The next thing was just a huge explosion and debris all over my face," Hamilton told CBC. "I didn't know what else to do, so I called 911."
articles.content:
Ruth Hamilton was woken up by a cosmic crash on October 3, when a meteorite blazed through her roof and landed on her pillow inches away from her face, according to CBC News.

articles.title: South Africa’s rule of law is worsening - News24
articles.description: Although South Africa’s democracy is more intact, its institutions more durable and its climate more transparent than most of its regional counterparts, its ranking has traditionally been dragged down by the lack of security.
articles.content:
